misc: Loves basketball even more than Marcus, making some fans wonder if he's a real golfer
biography: Pasi, often referred to as "Susi-Pasi", is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing Vuosaari Golf Helsinki. With a competitive spirit and a love for the game, he is preparing for his fourth appearance at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025.
While Pasi has secured one coveted Hector Trophée victory in previous years, the Victor Trophy has remained elusive. He is known for his strategic play and unwavering determination on the course.

Off the green, Pasi harbors a passion for basketball that rivals even that of Marcus, leading some to playfully question his true allegiance to golf. Nevertheless, Pasi's commitment to the Hector Trophée is undeniable, and his presence adds an element of intrigue to the competition.
